name: Webley Alecto .22 air pistol
description: The Alecto .22 is a match grade multi-pump pneumatic air pistol.  It features 3 power levels - topping out at over 400 feet per second, 4-way adjustable trigger, ergonomic grip, accessory rails for mounting scopes, recoil free shooting, a rifled steel barrel, adjustable front & rear sights.  It takes a little longer to load because of the need for 3 pumps.

name: Browning Buckmark air pistol
description: A popular spring-piston break barrel .177 air pistol, the Browning Buckmark was popular due to it's easy handling, high accuracy, and shooting enjoyment.  Shoots at around 350 fps in utter silence.

name: Crosman 1322 air pistol
description: A popular multipump pneumatic .22 air pistol, the crosman 1322 is cheap but effective and popular.  It's known for being highly moddable with high quality factory iron-sights.  This one comes with a collapsable stock.  Shoots at around 600 fps in utter silence.  the reload is slower because it must be pumped ten times with the underbarrel pump arm to be effective.

name: RWS 34 Diana .22 air rifle
description: This is a good quality pre-cataclysm break-barrel single shot air rifle, powered by a spring and gas piston system.  It is quiet and accurate, firing shaped lead pellets at speed of a thousand feet per second.  Since this is an airgun, a rimfire rifle scope can't be installed.

name: Gamo Big Cat 1250 .22 air rifle
description: This is a pre-cataclysm break-barrel single shot air rifle, powered by a spring and gas piston system.  It is quiet and accurate, firing shaped lead pellets at speed of 1250 fps for above-average damage.  However, the gamo big cat is a starter rifle known to shake itself apart early on, with low durability and not great accuracy, but still works at closer range.  Since this is an airgun, a rimfire rifle scope can't be installed.

name: Benjamin Trail NP XL1500 .177 air rifle
description: The Benjamin trail XL Magnum is accurate and quiet.  This is a pre-cataclysm break-barrel single shot air rifle, powered by a spring and gas piston system.  It fires shaped .177 caliber lead pellets at speed of 1500 fps. a rimfire rifle scope can't be installed.

name: Walther LGV Ultra .177 air rifle
description: This is a fancy pre-cataclysm break-barrel single shot air rifle, powered by a spring and gas piston system.  It is quiet and accurate, firing shaped lead pellets at speed of 1000 feet per second.  Since this is an airgun, a rimfire rifle scope can't be installed.  This rifle is easier to reload than some others.

name: Ruger Blackhawk .177 air rifle
description: The Ruger Blackhawk Combo rifle is an accurate and quiet rifle known for its high range and exceptional quality factory iron-sights, but suffers from cheap aluminum screws that tend to vibrate out.  This is a decent quality pre-cataclysm break-barrel single shot air rifle, powered by a spring and gas piston system.  It is quiet and accurate, firing .177 caliber lead pellets at speed of 1000 fps.  It takes less strength to cock and reload than some other air rifles.  A rimfire rifle scope can't be installed.
